entry.title: valorisa/ntp-ts-client: A lightweight TypeScript application built on Node.js to fetch the current date and time from an NTP server. Features include Jest for robust unit testing, Docker integration for seamless deployment, and compatibility with Alpine Linux.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript application built on Node.js to fetch the current date and time from an NTP server. Features include Jest for robust unit testing, Docker integration for seamless deployment, and compatibility with Alpine Linux.

entry.title: kaleb110/foxios: ⚡ a simple, lightweight and blazingly fast fetch wrapper for making HTTP requests easily
entry.content: ⚡ a simple, lightweight and blazingly fast fetch wrapper for making HTTP requests easily

entry.title: moneymessgame/AIrine: AIrine is a decentralized local node system designed for Android devices in technically limited regions. Each node runs a lightweight Express.js server that exposes an open API, enabling local access to essential AI tools and data without an internet connection. A Next.js client leverages WebRTC to interact with AI agents
entry.content: AIrine is a decentralized local node system designed for Android devices in technically limited regions. Each node runs a lightweight Express.js server that exposes an open API, enabling local access to essential AI tools and data without an internet connection. A Next.js client leverages WebRTC to interact with AI agents

entry.title: sadaigm/ai-as-agent: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
entry.content: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
